title: China, Russia, and Brazil discuss BRICS cooperation
description: In a series of high-level phone conversations, China’s President Xi Jinping, Russian President Vladimir Putin, and Brazilian President Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva have commenced discussions about their collaborative work within the BRICS bloc. BRICS – comprising Brazil, Russia, India, China, and South Africa – stands as a testament to the economic prowess of emerging ... Read more

title: Arbitrum price analysis: ARB price progresses to $1.17 level as a result of bullish run
description: Arbitrum price analysis is bullish, with the ARB/USD pair rising to the $1.17 level. title: EAEU urges BRICS and SCO for joint digital currency use
description: In a strategic move aimed at furthering economic integration, Mikhail Myasnikovich, the Chairman of the Board of the Eurasian Economic Commission (EEC), has urged the BRICS nations, the Shanghai Cooperation Organization (SCO), and the Eurasian Economic Union (EAEU) to embrace the potential of digital currencies. Speaking at the second Eurasian Economic Forum in Moscow, Myasnikovich ... Read more

title: XRP is up 2% amid decentralization discussions

title: Sandbox CEO’s Twitter account hacked to promote fake airdrop
description: A Twitter account belonging to Arthur Madrid, the co-founder and CEO of The Sandbox, a metaverse project, was compromised recently by an unknown hacker. The hacker used the account to spread a phishing scam that claimed to offer a free…

title: Dubai deepens crypto ties with proposed Bitcoin Tower Hotel
description: Italian developer, Salvatore Leggiero, unveils plans for the Bitcoin Tower, an hotel chain in Dubai that combines blockchain technology, artificial intelligence, and material sustainability. title: Polygon’s Co-Founders Inspire Kenzi Wang With Remarkable Journey
description:
Kenzi Wang hosted a podcast with Polygon’s co-founders, reflecting on their journey from “humble beginnings to champions”. The episode discussed the Polygon founder’s early days of MATIC, and how the co-founders collaborate. Co-founder JD shared insights on Polygon’s focus on scalability and developer-friendliness. Symbolic Capital founder Kenzi Wang recently tweeted about their podcast episode with […]
